sn7.3:1.1: On one occasion the Blessed One was dwelling at Rājagaha in the Bamboo Grove, the Squirrel Sanctuary.
sn7.3:1.3: “It is said that the brahmin of the Bhāradvāja clan has gone forth from the household life into homelessness under the ascetic Gotama. ”
sn7.3:1.4: Angry and displeased, he approached the Blessed One and abused and reviled him with rude, harsh words. When he had finished speaking, the Blessed One remained silent.
sn7.3:1.5: Then the brahmin Asurindaka Bhāradvāja said to the Blessed One:

sn7.3:2.2: When, by speech, he bellows harshly;
sn7.3:2.3: Patient endurance is the true victory.
